PyMOCD provides several configuration options to control its behavior, performance, and output.

## Available Configuration

### [Threading Control](/docs/library-configuration/limiting-usage/)

Manage CPU core utilization and parallelization behavior using Rayon's thread pool.

### Logging & Debug Levels

**Coming Soon**: Detailed guide to debug output verbosity levels (0-3) and logging configuration.

---

Configure these options before running algorithms for optimal performance and resource management.
